DataElement.preferredDefinition: The measured size of a lesion as a result of a histological examination of the tissue characteristics and abnormalities.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The microscopic study of characteristic tissue abnormalities by employing various cytochemical and immunocytochemical stains._The size of a lesion in its greatest dimension.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/18/22 mr Released per DCT and SME.   12/14/21 mr Removed PVs, changed to Number, non-enumerated, to accommodate data in LabCAS. Created additional VD 7977725 to hold coding in cases where lesions not measured. 4/20/20 jk revised for new NCIt term for lesion size (C171342).  4/17/20 jk created for MCL PCA Breast content.  Incomplete pending syn or new term for "lesion size".

ReferenceDocuments.name: MCL-Coding Breast 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Note: If a measurement is not available, use CDE size_code, 797780, to assign a code representing the size of the lesion.
